name: Sam Liebowitz
offering: Podcast Creation, Podcast Host, Podcast Marketing, Podcast Services, Podcasts Course
what_you_do: Sam Liebowitz is Director and Executive Producer of Talking Alternative Broadcasting, a broadcast-quality Internet Radio Station, and hosts The Conscious Consultant Hour, a weekly radio talk show focused on raising audience awareness in all aspects of life.
who_you_serve: Entrepreneurs, professionals, and individuals seeking personal development, empowerment, and conscious living.
social_proof: Bestselling author; featured speaker at TEDxUpperWestSide in 2016; Talking Alternative reaches people in over 110 countries; entrepreneur since 1993.
signature_programs: The Conscious Consultant Hour (weekly radio show); book: Everyday Awakening
business_focus: Running an empowering internet radio station and consulting practice focused on personal growth and conscious leadership.
service_provided: radio broadcasting, speaking, facilitation, mentoring, author
